set-form-filename.name: set-form-filename
set-form-filename.displayName: Set FlowFile Form Data File Name

Max Length To Put In Attribute.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute
Max Length To Put In Attribute.displayName: Max Length To Put In Attribute

properties.monthly:
SELECT "year", "month", currency, 
       AVG(rate) AS avg_rate, 
       MIN(rate) AS min_rate, 
       MAX(rate) AS max_rate
FROM FLOWFILE
GROUP BY "year", "month", currency
ORDER BY "year", "month", currency

properties.weekly:
SELECT "year", "week", currency, 
       AVG(rate) AS avg_rate, 
       MIN(rate) AS min_rate, 
       MAX(rate) AS max_rate
FROM FLOWFILE
GROUP BY "year", "week", currency
ORDER BY "year", "week", currency
